医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调迫切需要改善儿科应急准备大多数美国医院急诊科 -；缺乏人员、培训和设备——；没有充分准备好照顾孩子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-highlights-urgent-need-for-improved-pediatric-emergency-preparedness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-highlights-urgent-need-for-improved-pediatric-emergency-preparedness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33e04a6c-9f6e-43ee-a247-32cc8fac1413 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 21:15:51 -0400 Study highlights urgent need for improved pediatric emergency preparedness
研究人员发现致命性胶质母细胞瘤的有效治疗策略胶质母细胞瘤 (GBM) 是最致命的脑肿瘤，诊断后中位生存率仅为 12-16 个月。尽管进行了手术、放疗和化疗治疗，GBM患者的两年生存率仍低于10%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Researchers-discover- effective-treatment-strategy-for-lethal-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Researchers-discover- effective-treatment-strategy-for-lethal-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d136c37a-f3c3-4d3c-86ac-a37e5abfa75e Mon, 07 Oct 2024 21:05:24 -0400 Researchers discover effective treatment strategy for lethal glioblastoma
英国中年成年人的心血管健康状况优于美国成年人伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究显示，30 多岁和 40 多岁的英国成年人的肥胖、高血压和高胆固醇发病率低于美国成年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/British-adults-in-midlife-show-better-cardioangio-health-than-American-counterparts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/British-adults-in-midlife-show-better-cardioangio-health-than-American-counterparts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=351f2863-1a56-46dc-a0be-9f78cdb712c1 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 20:57:24 -0400 British adults in midlife show better cardiovascular health than American counterparts
研究揭示育龄妇女丙型肝炎治疗方面的差距据美国疾病控制与预防中心称，大多数丙型肝炎病毒 (HCV) 感染儿科病例是围产期的，这意味着该病毒在怀孕或分娩期间从亲生父母传播给孩子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-reveals-gaps-in-hepatitis-C-treatment-among-reproductive-ged-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-reveals-gaps-in-hepatitis-C-treatment-among-reproductive-ged-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a2aabc0-4945-4e0f-aa4e-5f929fbe1cce Mon, 07 Oct 2024 20:48:12 -0400 Study reveals gaps in hepatitis C treatment among reproductive-aged women
创新免疫疗法利用自然杀伤 T 细胞对抗实体瘤在抗击癌症方面，嵌合抗原受体T细胞（CAR-T）疗法在治疗血癌方面取得了显着的成功。然而，它对实体瘤基本上无效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Innovative-immunotherapy-harnesses-natural-killer-T-cells-to-combat-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Innovative-immunotherapy-harnesses-natural-killer-T-cells-to-combat-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07281675-123b-4184-9622-28e194fc3487 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 20:39:48 -0400 Innovative immunotherapy harnesses natural killer T cells to combat solid tumors
研究人员利用人工智能揭示胶质母细胞瘤预后的性别差异多年来，癌症研究人员注意到，患有致命性脑癌（胶质母细胞瘤）的男性多于女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Researchers-use-AI-to-reveal-sex-based-differences-in-glioblastoma-prognosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Researchers-use-AI-to-reveal-sex-based-differences-in-glioblastoma-prognosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe769a67-5430-4c12-b438-727194fe968d Mon, 07 Oct 2024 20:32:45 -0400 Researchers use AI to reveal sex-based differences in glioblastoma prognosis
新研究证实人类大脑的废物清除途径长期以来，科学家们一直对大脑中的通路网络进行了理论分析，这些通路网络被认为可以清除代谢蛋白质，否则这些蛋白质会堆积起来，并可能导致阿尔茨海默氏症和其他形式的痴呆症。但他们从未明确地揭示过人体内的这个网络——；到目前为止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-study-confirms-brains-waste-clearance-pathways-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-study-confirms-brains-waste-clearance-pathways-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bed0852-1081-4940-88b5-c57fbb8f3041 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 20:27:54 -0400 New study confirms brain's waste-clearance pathways in humans
每周注射抗肥胖药物的费用比手术还要高根据《外科内窥镜》杂志最近发表的一项分析，每周注射流行的抗肥胖药物利拉鲁肽 (Saxenda) 或司马鲁肽 (Wegovy) 的费用在不到一年的时间里就超过了代谢和减肥手术的费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Weekly-injections-of-anti-obesity-medications-cost-more-than-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Weekly-injections-of-anti-obesity-medications-cost-more-than-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c784c5dc-d54a-4695-bed0-184ce5feee83 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 20:03:20 -0400 Weekly injections of anti-obesity medications cost more than surgery
奥曲肽治疗食管静脉曲张出血的少即是多南卡罗来纳医科大学的研究人员在《美国医学科学杂志》最近的一项研究中表明，有必要澄清食管静脉曲张出血后奥曲肽治疗的现行治疗指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Less-is-more-in-octreotide-therapy-for-esophageal-variceal-hemorrhage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Less-is-more-in-octreotide-therapy-for-esophageal-variceal-hemorrhage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6257c37-dd6a-4910-849c-cee2dd90ec57 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 19:58:40 -0400 Less is more in octreotide therapy for esophageal variceal hemorrhage
研究揭示健康女性黄体期的长度不同目前的预期是，每个排卵月经周期都会有一个持续大约 14 天的黄体期（从卵子释放到下次月经的时间）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-reveals-diverse-lengths-of-luteal-phases-in-healthy-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-reveals-diverse-lengths-of-luteal-phases-in-healthy-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0032b951-26bf-4f27-9139-3698109996c3 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 19:54:22 -0400 Study reveals diverse lengths of luteal phases in healthy women
